SourceAnalyzer.Name: Nerdery
SourceAnalyzer.Description: These custom rules provide extensions to the ones provided with StyleCop.

Rule.Name: PublicConstructorsShouldBeDocumented
Rule.Description: Nerdery standards require comments on public methods.

Rule.Name: PublicMethodsShouldBeDocumented
Rule.Description: Nerdery standards require comments on public methods.

Rule.Name: RegionMustBeSeparatedByBlankLine
Rule.Context: Regions have to be spaced properly
Rule.Description: Nerdery standards require a space before/after the beginning or end of a region definition. An exception to this rule is if the begin region is beneath the start of a { or the end region is prior to a }

Rule.Name: RegionNameMustHaveFirstLetterCapitalized
Rule.Context: Regions must have the first character capitalized
Rule.Description: Nerdery standards require a region to have a name and that name has to have its first character capitalized.
